entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 13.

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 40%
